section.name: Overview
section.p: This module is used to insure that the samples collection is not contra-indicated and that all expected samples have been collected by the phlebotomist.

A list of the bar codes affixed to the tubes is maintained as they are scanned. The following attributes are configurable and validated when applicable:
Number of tubes containing the primary samples expected
The format of the bar code used to identify the tubes
The elements making up the bar code. They may be chosen from the following list: participant code, additive code and random numbers
